text: @mmpadellan If #COVID19 was a Community Revitalization Act (CRA) then "NY Slenderman" @jaredkushner would be very involved and would have destroyed the virus like he does our vulnerable neighbors that live in his properties! #coronavirus #pathetic #COVIDIOTS #NYSlenderman
